SEMESTER_INVALID_YEAR_RANGE: End year must be exactly one greater than start year.
SEMESTER_COURSE_REPEATED: Courses must not be repeated in the semester.
SEMESTER_NO_COURSES: You should add at least one course.
SEMESTER_COURSE_ID_UUID: Course ID must be a valid UUID.
SEMESTER_START_YEAR_INT: Start year must be an integer.
SEMESTER_START_YEAR_MIN: Start year must be at least 2019.
SEMESTER_END_YEAR_INT: End year must be an integer.
SEMESTER_END_YEAR_MIN: End year must be at least 2020.
SEMESTER_COURSES_ARRAY: Semester courses must be an array.
SEMESTER_COURSES_NESTED: Each semester course must be valid.
